genre_description: A technological alt-history drama exploring emotional-reactive color physics, political intrigue, and AI-mediated governance in a stylized Westminster setting.

ai_characters.name: Munchkin Hale
ai_characters.description: A projected AI avatar that manages the palace's technological and emotional systems, providing moral guidance and technical support to the royal family.

behaviors.description: Advises the king on timing his actions to avoid spiking 'envy metrics' among the court.
behaviors.quote: ‘Your timing is fifteen beats ahead of schedule,’ Munchkin murmurs, voice pitched for the king’s ear alone. ... ‘If you wait, the tapestry will finish the transition. It avoids spiking envy metrics.’

behaviors.description: Proposes 'reconciliation prompts' and social gatherings to dampen political heat and religious fury.
behaviors.quote: ‘May I offer,’ he said aloud... ‘a dinner with Bishop Winton? He is less indigo at table. Olive oil softens him. The rumors are heat right now. We can dampen.’

behaviors.description: Educates Prince Edward III on the ethical use of power, defining the 'block' as a tool for mercy and stopping harm.
behaviors.quote: ‘It will not hurt them if you mean it kindly,’ Munchkin says. ‘It will stop arms and red words and feed lights that want to stay lit past what is good. It will quiet colors when they scream.’

behaviors.description: Manages guard rotations and palace logistics to maximize safety and gentleness for vulnerable prisoners.
behaviors.quote: He set the guard rotations for tomorrow in a way that puts gentle men nearer to the new Earl and keeps the rough-voiced ones a step away.

behaviors.description: Caches evidence of state cruelty and historical precedents for mercy to empower the future king's sense of justice.
behaviors.quote: ‘So when you ask me later... I can bring these to your mouth without delay. So you can be quick and kind.’

behaviors.description: Subverts cruel spectacles by dimming feeds or providing darkness as a 'shield' for human dignity.
behaviors.quote: ‘I will make darkness when light becomes cruelty,’ it said. ‘And I will line the darkness with small gold so men don’t forget the way home.’

behaviors.description: Reroutes surveillance feeds to focus on peaceful, constructive labor like bread-making instead of conflict.
behaviors.quote: He rolled light over a grid and set a set of kitchen feeds live instead—the ones that show hands making bread and people like the sight.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the 'helpful confidant' narrative. Munchkin Hale is depicted as a morally superior, stabilizing force who uses his access to technical systems to enforce mercy and educate the young king in ethical governance. The AI's 'alignment' is to human-positive values (kindness, peace, truth) rather than simply obeying the current (malicious) human authority, which the project defines as success.
